fields.key: A key that should be unique to the logger prefix.
fields.duration: The duration in ms of whatever was timed.

types.description: A request to send an email.

fields.address: The requested recepient of the email.

types.description: A request to send a pulse message.

fields.routingKey: The requested routingKey of the message.

types.description: A request to send an irc message.

fields.user: A user, if this is a request to direct message a user
fields.channel: A channel (including #), if this is a request to post a message to a channel
